title: Cutting the Fat: X-Men Teaches Us That Jokes Are Evil! (Dialogue Writing for Beginners)
description:
A page from X-Men: Years of Future Past One where the writer forgets this is a comic and thinks they're writing a twitter thread. And the subject for today? Jokes are evil and humor can lead to tyranny. #marvelcomics #marvel #xmen 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/literaturedevil
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/literaturedevil
Dr. Alpha Miracle Child on Kindle: https://amzn.to/3dQGci6
